title: Charming Karlikowo Studio near the Baltic
description: Nestled on the second floor of a historic Sopot villa, this studio apartment captures old-world charm in a thoughtfully modernized setting. Featuring beautiful wood beams, a cozy living area with a compact yet functional fireplace, and carefully restored details, the space honors the building’s storied past. At 33 square meters, it smartly incorporates work and leisure zones to maximize functioning space. Ideal for those seeking comfort and efficiency by the sea, it includes a bright niche perfectly suited as your home office.
neighborhood_description: Karlikowo, known for its welcoming artistic community and pet-friendly vibe, offers residents vibrant street culture with a peaceful twist. Admire distant mountain views on scenic walks, and enjoy being mere steps from Sopot’s famous waterfront cafés and galleries. Smooth public transport and safe bike lines make commuting effortless and sustainable in this well-connected neighborhood.
key_features: shared co-working lounge on ground floor
lifestyle_benefits: inspirational setting for artistic and digital work
short walk to Baltic Sea and waterfront promenade
trendy cafés and team spaces nearby
peaceful yet vibrant local art scene
target_buyer: Remote professionals, digital nomads, or solo entrepreneurs seeking a blend of historic character, modern amenities, and creative inspiration steps from Sopot beach.
market_positioning: This property offers rare historic charm in a popular, burgeoning creative enclave. Its efficient layout, coworking amenities, and waterfront proximity distinguish it from typical modern studios, making it a special find for urban lifestyle seekers.
